misc: Regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results
biography: Sami, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is set to make his seventh appearance in the upcoming edition. Representing Hirsala Golf, Sami brings a quiet determination to the greens, often described by his peers as a player who meticulously plans each shot with a calculating mind.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Sami's consistent presence in the competition speaks volumes about his dedication and passion for the sport. He regularly competes in the Finnish Mid Tour as well with decent results.

Known for his strategic approach and unwavering focus, Sami is always a player to watch. His calm demeanor on the course belies a fierce competitor, and many anticipate that his experience will translate into a strong performance in the upcoming tournament.
